name: EgoDeath Prologue
description:
a beginning to an end. the start of many chapters to a story of intrigue and adventure. (and maybe sex.)

you visit a dark bar somewhere. the man at the counter knows who you are, and seems to want to test you about something. 

short visual novel i started development of literally 5 days ago. there are some improvements that can be made, and i will add more to this as i reach closer to the release of the first chapter of this series. for now, enjoy this brief existential horror ~

credits -
@hellraven_ - hell's flower ~ kill the light (character theme song, intense moment)
@Dememenic - calamity (main menu theme) & city of light (bar theme)
